#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 200005
#define BASE 31
#define BLOCK 250
#define eps 1e-9
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;


int a[55];

int go(int start,int n){
	int extra=0;
	int ret=0;
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++){
		extra+=(a[i]-start);
		ret+=abs(a[i]-start);
		start++;
	}
	if(a[n]+extra==start){
		ret+=abs(a[n]-start);
		ret/=2;
		return ret;
	}
	return 1e9;
}

int main(){
	int t,n,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
		int ans=1e9;
		for(i=0;i<=50;i++)
		ans=min(ans,go(i,n));
		
		if(ans==1e9)
		printf("-1\n");
		else
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}	
	return 0;
}
